unverifiedTierWarningBlock.title: Your venue is no longer verified - action required
unverifiedTierWarningBlock.message1: <0>Why is this the case?</0> We want to ensure couples using the Bridebook app are getting the best possible service. To do that, we are heavily prioritising and recommending venues we know are experienced, professional and trusted by our previous couples.
unverifiedTierWarningBlock.message2: As an unverified venue, <1>you’ll miss out</1> on an average of <4>80% more enquiries</4>. There are a wealth of exclusive tools offered to verified venues to enable them to secure a high volume of quality enquiries. They can target ideal couples who have the right budget and guest numbers with ’Couples Targeting’ and they can track against competing venues with ‘Market Insights’ and more.
unverifiedTierWarningBlock.message3: If you would like to become a verified venue, appear at the top of search results and target the right couples, then please follow this link to arrange a suitable time for a call with your venue consultant.
